LanguageData.MessageRaidersDetectedEarlyAssault: {0} {1}'st on avastanud sinu ja alustavad nende rünnakut varakult.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersKidnapping: {0} {1}'st on otsustanud röövida keda nad saavad ja lahkuda.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersStealing: {0} {1}'st on otsustanud varastada mida nad saavad ja lahkuda.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersSatisfiedLeaving: {0} {1}'st on rahul tehtud kahjuga ja lahkuvad.
LanguageData.MessageVisitorsTrappedLeaving: {0} {1}'st on langenud lõksu ja kaevavad välja, et põgeneda.
LanguageData.MessageWornApparelDeterioratedAway: {0} kantud kolonisti {1} poolt on lagunenud täielikult.
LanguageData.MessageNeedBeaconToTradeWithShip: Sul on vaja kauplemismajakat, et kaubelda laevaga.\n\nMajakal peab olema elekter.
LanguageData.MessageOutOfNearbyShellsFor: {0} ei leidnud ühtegi lähedal olevat kasutatavat mürsku {1} jaoks.
LanguageData.MessageAnimalManhuntsOnTameFailed: Hoiatus: {0} võivad rünnata ebaõnnestunud taltsutamise korral ({1} võimalus).
LanguageData.MessageTameAndNameSuccess: {0} edukalt taltsutas {1} ({2} võimalus) ja andis talle nime {3}.
LanguageData.MessageColonyCannotAfford: See tehing on koloonia jaoks liiga kallis.
LanguageData.MessageColonyNotEnoughSilver: Sul pole piisavalt hõbedat valmis kauplemiseks.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateHarvestable: Peab määrama lõikusvalmid piisavalt kasvanud taimed.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateHarvestableWood: Peab määrama puidusaagikusga piisavalt kasvanud taimed.
LanguageData.MessageNothingCanRemoveThickRoofs: Miski ei saa eemaldada pakse katuseid.
LanguageData.MessageAlreadyInStorage: See on juba hoiustuses ja veetakse kõrge tähtsusega hoiusesse kui vajalik.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateStrippable: Peab määrama laiba või teadvusetu karakteri eemaldatava riietusega.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateSlaughterable: Peab määrama taltsa looma, kes kuulub kolooniale.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateOpenable: Peab määrama täis hauad või konteinerid.
LanguageData.MessageTooLowMedCare: Operatsioon vajab {0} või paremat, kuid {1}'i hetke meditsiinilise hoolduse mood on "{2}".
LanguageData.MessageInvoluntarySleep: {0} on kukkunud kokku ekstreemse väsimuse tõttu.
LanguageData.MessagePawnExitMapRelationsGain: Kuna {0} lahkus mapist tervelt on suhted {1}'ga paranenud {2} võrra.
LanguageData.MessageNoHandlerSkilledEnough: Ükski taltsutaja ei saa taltsutada {0}'t (vajab levelit {1} {2}'s, parimal taltsutaja - {3} on {4}).
LanguageData.MessageNewMarriageCeremony: Kolonistid kogunevad, et tähistada {0}'i ja {1}'i abielu.
LanguageData.MessageNewlyMarried: {0} ja {1} on abiellunud. Kolonistid nüüd tähistavad seda.
LanguageData.MessageNewBondRelationNewName: {0}'i ja {1}'i vahel on moodustunud side. {0}'i on andnud talle nime {2}.
LanguageData.MessageShipChunkDrop: Tükk tähelaeva on kukkunud kosmosest ja maandunud lähedal.
LanguageData.MessageCannotSellItemsReason: Mõngigate asjadega ei saa kaubelda järgneval põhjusel:
LanguageData.MessageConstructionFailed: {1} ebaõnnestus {0}'i ehitamise ajal. Osad ressursid on läinud raisku.

MessageCantAddWaypointBecauseUnreachable: It's not possible to reach this tile from the last waypoint.
MessageTransportersNotAdjacent: All pod launchers connected to the selected transport pods must be adjacent.
MessageCannotSelfTendEver: {0} is incapable of doing Doctor work, and so cannot ever self-tend.
MessageAutomaticallyReformedCaravan: Your colonists have reformed the caravan.
MessagePlantDiedOfRot: {0} has died from rotting due to being left unharvested.
MessageFactionPawnCrushed: {0} lost people to a roof collapse. Faction relation: {1}
MessageSettledInExistingMap: You have successfully settled in a new area.
MessageCaravanMemberHasExtremeMentalBrea: One of the caravan members has a mental break.
MessageRescueeJoined: Since you rescued HIM, {0} has joined your group!
MessagePawnLeftMapAndCreatedCaravan: {0} has left the area and formed a caravan.
MessageSelectOwnBaseToFormCaravan: To form a caravan, select your own colony or a site where you have people.
MessageFinishedLoadingTransporters: Your colonists have finished loading the transport pods.
MessageCantDoExecutionBecauseNoWardenCap: None of your wardens is capable of violence. The execution won't be performed.
MessageSiteCountdownBecauseNoMoreEnemies: You have defeated all enemies. In {0}, the caravan will automatically be reformed.
MessageYouHaveToReformCaravanNow: You have to reform the caravan now. Everyone left behind will be abandoned.
MessageCaravanFormationPaused: The caravan formation process will continue when everyone recovers from a mental break.
MessageTransportPodsArrivedAndAddedToCar: Your transport pods have arrived. The contents have been added to your caravan.
MessageVisitorsDangerousTemperature: {0} from {1} are leaving the map because of dangerous temperature.
MessageSelfTendUnsatisfied: To self-tend, {0} must also be assigned to Doctor work.
MessageSlaughteringBondedAnimal: Because they are bonded, slaughtering {0} will make {1} unhappy.
MessageCantAbandonLastColonist: You can't abandon the last colonist.
MessageCantAddWaypointBecauseLimit: You can't add more than {0} waypoints.
MessagePawnBeingBurned: {0} is being burned by superheated air!
MessageTransportPodsArrivedAndLost: Your transport pods have arrived, but since there were no colonists inside, the contents are lost.
MessageAmbushVictory: Victory! In {0}, the caravan will automatically be reformed. You can reform the caravan now in the World screen.
MessageNoLongerSocialFighting: {0} and {1} are no longer social fighting.
MessageTransportersLoadCanceled_FuelingP: The loading process has been canceled because one of the pod launchers has been destroyed.
MessageFailedToLoadTransportersBecauseCo: The loading process has been canceled because one of the colonists has been lost.
MessageCaravanFormationUnpaused: Your colonists will now continue forming a caravan.
MessageMaxPlanetCoveragePerformanceWarni: Warning: It can take a very long time to generate an entire planet.
MessageTransportersLoadingProcessStarted: Your colonists will now load the assigned items into the transport pods.
MessageMedicalOperationFailureRidiculous: {0} has failed in a ridiculous way while operating on {1}.
MessageScreenResTooSmallForUIScale: At this resolution and UI scale, the game interface would not fit on-screen. Please reduce UI scale or increase resolution.
MessageTransportPodsDestinationIsTooFar: Each pod launcher would need at least {0}x chemfuel to send transport pods that far.
MessageSiteCountdownBecauseNoEnemiesInit: In {0}, the caravan will automatically be reformed. You can reform the caravan now in the World screen.
MessageTransportersLoadCanceled_Transpor: The loading process has been canceled because one of the transport pods has been destroyed.
MessageAttackedCaravanIsNowHostile: Because you attacked a caravan of {0}, this faction is now hostile to you.
MessageCantEquipIncapableOfViolence: Cannot equip: {0} is incapable of violence.
MessageFailedToSendCaravanBecausePawnLos: Failed to send the caravan because one of the colonists, prisoners or animals has been lost.
